text: Francis Watson "Frank" Shaw (born 13 May 1864) was a Scottish footballer who played as a winger. ==Career== Born in Glasgow, Shaw played club football for Pollokshields Athletic and Queen's Park, and made two appearances for Scotland in 1884. He retired from football in 1885 to sail to India. ==References== Category:1864 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Scottish footballers Category:Scotland international footballers Category:Pollokshields Athletic F.C. players Category:Queen's Park F.C. players Category:Association football wingers Category:Place of death missing
title: Frank Shaw (footballer)
